CodeList.Name: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Short of breath while at rest?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Short of Breath at Rest

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Short of breath while doing physical activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Short of Breath Doing Physical Activity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Concerned about getting a cold or your breathing getting worse?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Concern About Breathing Get Worse

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Depressed because of your breathing problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Depressed Because of Breathing Problem

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - In general, during the past 24 hours, how much of the time: Did you cough?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Did You Cough

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - In general, during the past 24 hours, how much of the time: Did you produce sputum or phlegm?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Produce Sputum or Phlegm

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Strenuous physical activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Strenuous Activity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Moderate physical activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Moderate Activity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Daily activities at home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Daily Activity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Social activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Social Activity

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire CCQ 24 Hour Version Test Code Terminology
